title: Workshop on Utilizing Mobile Microlearning Tools for Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics concepts and mobile device usage experience
context.additional_context: Supports adult learners in designing effective learning activities within mobile environments, centered on practical math content applicable to daily life.

learning_goals: Develop at least three mobile-optimized mathematics learning activities using instructional design tools
Visually structure activity types (individual/collaborative/assessment) linked to learning outcomes
Analyze and improve the effectiveness of designed mathematics learning activities through formative evaluation

resources: Digital content templates for math education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
